// src/components/CryptoTable.js import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import sampleData from '../utils/sampleData'; // Import sample data const CryptoTable = () => { const [cryptos, setCryptos] = useState(sampleData); // Use sampleData as initial state return (

Crypto Prices Overview

{cryptos.map((crypto) => ( ))}
Logo Name Price 1h Change 24h Change 7d Change Market Cap 24h Volume Circulating Supply
{crypto.logo} {crypto.name} ({crypto.symbol}) ${crypto.price.toFixed(2)} {crypto.percentChange1h}% {crypto.percentChange24h}% {crypto.percentChange7d}% ${crypto.marketCap.toLocaleString()} ${crypto.volume24h.toLocaleString()} {crypto.circulatingSupply} {crypto.symbol}
); }; export default CryptoTable;
